TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SettingChangingEventHandler(object sender, SettingChangingEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SettingChangingEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SettingChangingEventHandler(sender As Object, e As SettingChangingEventArgs)
public delegate void SettingChangingEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, SettingChangingEventArgs ^ e);
type SettingChangingEventHandler = delegate of obj * SettingChangingEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: The source of the event, typically an application settings wrapper class derived from the class.
A containing the data for the event.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging> event occurs before the value of an application settings property is changed, typically through a call to the <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.Item%2A> method. <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingChanging> can be canceled through the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingChangingEventArgs> event data class.
